long_description: The Line Mastermind skis deliver high performance at a great value. What could be better if you're looking to take your skills to the next level in the park, pipe, bumps and beyond?. Durable, light and lively aspen wood core is built to give you the goods for freestyle skiing anywhere on the mountain and offers high durability. Fiberglass is layered in 4 directions around the core of the ski, providing uncompromised strength and snappy responsiveness. Symmetrical flex pattern in tips and tails creates identical responsivenss whether you're riding forward or switch. Extra-thick bases and edges add significant durability and impact resistance, and let you tune your skis many times throughout the season. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: The Line Mastermind skis deliver high performance at a great value. What could be better if you're looking to take your skills to the next level in the park, pipe, bumps and beyond?.
